memberdef.name: CHECK
memberdef.initializer: do { \ const bool result = ARG; \ if(!result) { \ ::Error(APP_NAME, "Failed to execute: \"%s\"", \ #ARG ); \ return 1; \ } \ } while( false )

briefdescription.para: Contains RootCore testing code for the overlap removal tools.

detaileddescription.para: At the beginning you will find some global accessors/decorators and selection functions. These are just for convenience and roughly simulate a "standard" object selection.
